content:
Are you sure he's gonna be ok?
[[>]]
I can't guarantee you anything.
[[/>]]
What do you mean?
[[>]]
He's a lab rat now. As said in the song: "Whatever will be, will be."
[[/>]]
You promised you'd cure him.
[[>]]
And cure him I will.
[[/>]]

[[>]]
What was that?
[[/>]]

[[=]]
SORRYSORRYSORRYSORRY
[[/=]]

[[>]]
Control him, shit.
[[/>]]

[[=]]
SORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYS
ORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSO
RRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSOR
RYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORR
YSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRYSORRY
[[/=]]

[[>]]
It's almost ending. We can do this.
[[/>]]

What did you do?

[[>]]
I did it.
[[/>]]

What?

[[>]]
Can't you see? He ascended.
[[/>]]

I want him cured, not that!

[[>]]
He's more than cured. He's safe and sound.
[[/>]]

Where is he?

[[>]]
[[collapsible show="He's here" hide=" "]]

[[div style="margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; width: 15em;"]]
